text: @Yamiche @weijia WH denied that staff referred to COVID-19 as Kung Flu when speaking to reporter Weija Jiang. Well, at #TrumpRallyFail during #TrumpMeltdown Trump referred to COVID-19 as Kung Flu, which means WH lied. Trump just can’t help it. Being racist is like breathing for him. A compulsion. https://t.co/Mb5KdGoeeS
